0.5.name: wordpress/trustcloud-trustcard-widget
0.5.description: The TrustCard Wordpress Widget is the simplest way to integrate your TrustCard into your site or blog. Like a portable online ID card for the Sharing Economy, the TrustCard is a snapshot into a your TrustCloud profile.
